title: ClustExp_HistTable.py
description: Script to extract the data table from history of datasets from 3dttest++, 3dMVM, or 3dLME.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Name for output (no path). Default is GroupOut.

session.title: Session
session.description: Output parent folder if you don't want the current working directory. Default is ./

overwrite.title: Overwrite
overwrite.description: Remove previous folder with same PREFIX
